content: texture is wonderful for baby blankets something to squish with little fingers and this ridge baby blanket is such a fun project to hook up for a gorgeous new baby gift or a beautiful comforter for a toddler **size** width 25½in/65cm length 31½in/80cm **you will need** paintbox yarns is exclusively available at lovecrafts com ● 13/1 76oz/50g balls of paintbox yarns baby dk prints 7 balls in battleship - stripe ● us g/6 4mm crochet hook ● scissors ● large eyed needle **gauge gauge ** 17 sts and 24 row to a 4in/10cm square worked in pattern using us g/6 4mm hook
